alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 27 at 5:57AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Guam, Rota, Tinian, and Saipan. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Due to the proximity of a tropical disturbance, JTWC Invest 93W located northwest of the Marianas, more substantial rainfall is anticipated through Wednesday across the Marianas. Satellite analysis, model guidance and previous trends indicate possibility for rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches through Wednesday. Localized training cells can bring up to 4 to 6 inches of rainfall. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
